body_html: Since it seems relevant to people here using Bazel on Windows; i created a chocolatey package to make installation easier. https://chocolatey.org/packages/bazel. Please try it out and if there are any problems (it is new), tweet or raise an issue over at bazelbuild/bazel.
body_text: Since it seems relevant to people here using Bazel on Windows; i created a chocolatey package to make installation easier. https://chocolatey.org/packages/bazel. Please try it out and if there are any problems (it is new), tweet or raise an issue over at bazelbuild/bazel.
body: Since it seems relevant to people here using Bazel on Windows; i created a chocolatey package to make installation easier. https://chocolatey.org/packages/bazel. Please try it out and if there are any problems (it _is_ new), tweet or raise an issue over at bazelbuild/bazel.
